page.title: 11The Manor Inn,Cockerham
page.content: The Manor Inn,originally built l878 & owned by Mitchells of Lancaster (Brewers)Ltd.Present tenants Arthur & Ann Holmes.The Inn was modernised in l984 by present tenants,it is represented in the Garstang Pool League,Overwyre Darts League,Garstang Ladies Darts & Dominoes League,& Mitchell's Summer League.The Inn offers a warm & friendly atmosphere combined with home cooking ranging from Mixed Grills @ Â£5.45 to sandwiches from 80p.Facilities offered include Large Beer Garden with swings and slides,an Aviary containing 40 birds & Fish Pond with waterfall.In the summer months there is an outdoor barbecue on Wednesday and Sunday evenings. There is also a solarium which opened in l981 and run commercially until l984.It is now used by family and friends.
